content.webTitle: Plant of the week: Allium 'Ivory Queen'

fields.headline: Plant of the week: Allium 'Ivory Queen'
fields.bodyText: Allium 'Ivory Queen' produces a ball of white, fluffy flowers set off by silvery-grey leaves in May and June. Plant in well-drained soil in full sun: these bulbs are particularly at home in a gravel garden. Buy 10 bulbs for £9.95 or 30 for £19.90 (inc UK mainland p&p; supplied as bulbs). To order, call 0330 333 6851, quoting ref GUPW198, or at our Reader Offers page. Delivery from September.
